resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108733</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108733</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202666</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mummy Madness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mama-Verrücktheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Folie de Maman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Loucura Do Mummy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Follia del mummy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρέλα μουμιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Locura De la Momia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a lesson for seventh grade Social Sciences students to learn and demonstrate the mummification process used in ancient Egypt.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Lektion, damit 7. Grad 
Sozialwissenschaften Kursteilnehmer den Mummifizierungprozeß erlernen
und demonstrieren, der in altem Ägypten verwendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une leçon pour que les étudiants sociaux 
des sciences de la septième catégorie apprennent et pour démontrent
le procédé de momification utilisé en Egypte antique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma lição para que os estudantes sociais
das ciências da sétima classe aprendam e demonstrem o processo do 
mummification usado em Egipto antigo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una lezione affinchè gli allievi sociali 
di scienze del settimo grado impari e per dimostrare il processo di 
mummificazione usato nell'Egitto antico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα μάθημα για τους έβδομους σπουδαστές 
κοινωνικών επιστημών βαθμού για να μάθει και να καταδείξει τη 
mummification διαδικασία που χρησιμοποιείται στην αρχαία 
Αίγυπτο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una lección para que los estudiantes 
sociales de las ciencias del séptimo grado aprendan y demuestren el 
proceso de la momificación usado en Egipto antiguo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JO OLIVER
FN:JO OLIVER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202666</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108733</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/mummy-madness</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
